text: tis. Guinevere’s sister Saleane, not Guinevere, was the lover of Arthur’s imposter Knight “Sir Lancelot,’’ a Luciferian Knights Templar sent in to sabotage the Emerald Covenant Mission. Knights Templar Annu-Melchizedek races intentionally distorted true Arthurian period history. Teachings of the RRTs and Star Gate Signet Councils were hidden in occult secret societies of the Knights Templar. The histor- ical realities of the Maji Grail King lineage and Arthur’s Emerald Cov- enant Mission were intentional “re-written Nibiruian Anunnaki style,” romanticizing Victorous (''Merlin'') and other characters that as- sisted the Knights Templar in undermining Arthur’s Emerald Covenant Mission. 315
